body.name: Casual Linen Beige Men's 2 Piece Suits Wedding Suits Slim Fit Groomsmen Tuxedos Summer Linen Vest Pant
features: Fabric type Outer: 55% linen and 45% cotton; Lining: 100% polyester

This is a light weight vest pant set,formal 2 pieces men suit. The fabric is soft and thin.It is suitable for many formal or casual occations, such as beach wedding,birthday party,prom party,homecoming party,wedding party,retro theme party or daily wear.
ABOUT SIZE: Please order the suit according to our third finished measurements chart. The pant waist is adjustable, 2 inches adjustment is no problem.
Package includes:Vest + Pants ,2-Piece Suit, There may be a slight color different between the photo and the finished suit. Hope you can understand this.
We also have custom service, please email through amazon, we will help you to process custom order.
Cleaning: Dry-clean only; Storage: Always hang on; Pressing: Steam ironing.
body.description: Notifications 1.please choose right size according to our size chart.If these sizes can not fit you well,we can custom it for you.Please choose the custom order and provide the following measurements to us for custom size. You can see our measurement method in the photo part. 1.Neckline =___CM or inches 2.Shoulder to shoulder =____CM or inches 3.Arm Length = ____CM or inches 4.Bicep= ____CM or inches 5.Cuff = ____CM or inches 6.Chest =____CM or inches 7.Belly=____CM or inches 8.Waist =_____CM or inches 9.Hips= _____CM or inches 10.Clothes Length =______CM or inches 11.Pants Length= _____ CM or inches 12.Thigh=_______CM or inches 13.Height=________CM or inches 14.your net weight=_______kg or pounds----Choose one Please note: There would have around 0.5-1 inches size difference due to different manual measurement. Please be aware that colors might look slightly different in person due to camera quality and monitor settings. Some tie and button can not exactly same as the picture ,if you can't accept, please be careful to order

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #85,802 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #140 in Men's Suits

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way Better Than Expected
reviews.reviewText: I read the great reviews, saw the pics and decided to purchase immediately. I was hoping for the best and wasn't disappointed. This combo fit me almost perfectly right out of the package. The pants were a little too long, but I hemmed them with magic tape and an iron. Packed it away for my trip, then ironed the entire outfit when I arrived. Got several compliments. Looked good, felt good. I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable as I expected it to be.
reviews.reviewText: I was a little leary about ordering clothes online, because i have a unique build. This outfit was a great fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars READ: Good but there are not so good things.
reviews.reviewText: Hello if your reading this great job!I love this outfit so much very formal but casual, although I’m about 190-200 pounds and I also pick the XX-L in size 5’7 and the pants were double that which really such it was more of a size 6’2 but remember it only comes with the vest and pants but otherwise it’s great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Outfit Fell Apart on 1st Use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this outfit to wear to my daughters college graduation because I wanted a lightweight material as the ceremony was held outside in the summer heat due to Covid. As I was putting the pants on that morning, the metal clamp for adjustable waist straps broke, I tried to fix it but I was unable to so I had to use a safety pin to hold the pants together along with tightening my belt to ensure the waistline stayed intact. Then, later in the day I noticed that there was a rip inside the right pocket so I had make sure I didn't use that pocket. The outfit looks great but it seems the workmanship and/or materials are subpar. Although the outfit looks nice, I was only able to use it once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing will be an issue
reviews.reviewText: Ordered according to their size chart and even went up a size to be on the safe side. The pants fit but the vest was wayyyyyyyyy smaller than expected!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Gentleman Like...
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Listen, this set did what it was supposed to do! Specs: Age:37, 6'1, 255lbs, holds weight in stomach, average thighs for his weight. He's sturdy!He wears a 38 in suit bottoms, 38 in slim fit jeans (old navy/Levi) XL bottoms in casual cotton shorts. He's an XL tee (fitted) but could comfortably fit a 2X. With that said, I ordered the 3X and it fit perfect. He had the tailored look yet room in thighs/crotch area. Vest fit great and it has the adjusting strap in the back to tighten if necessary. The pants are long, we used some hem tape and took in about 3.5 inches after measuring his inseam.Got the beige color which is natural linen so it's very neutral. Material was lightweight but sturdy, if it's ripping on ppl they probably chose the wrong size. We went to a wedding where all white was requested and he still blended seamlessly in this color. He got so many compliments on how sharp he looked and he danced all night. Great staple set to have in your wardrobe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The vest is nice and thick. The pants are a little thin for my liking, but fine for the money. The pants just fit at the largest setting, but I’m sure the large would be too big. Overall I love it and it will be perfect for my 25th wedding anniversary celebration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great , comfortable & great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Fit great & Wore it for a themed fund raiser & got plenty of compliments. Pants are a bit long but easy to get altered. Hope I get a chance to wear it again soon.
